process.description:
Implements the provisioning of a single element; processOrderItem = single element of the order!!!

It uses "sendOrderAckToCRM" subflow to send Granite response to CRM.

It uses "handleGraniteWOSU" subflow to receive Granite WOSU, update orderStatus and forward WOSU to CRM.
process.label: Main STC Provisiong Process
